TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExecutionProperties extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<string, object>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ExecutionProperties Implements IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of String, Object))
public ref class ExecutionProperties sealed : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<System::String ^, System::Object ^>>

summary.span: 表示在特定範圍之屬性的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of properties at a particular scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLR 會透過執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS) 維護每個執行緒的執行內容。Through thread local storage (TLS), the CLR maintains an execution context for each thread. 這個執行內容會管理已知的執行緒作業，如執行緒識別、環境異動和目前的權限集，以及如具名位置等使用者定義的執行緒屬性。This execution context governs well-known thread properties such as the thread identity, the ambient transaction, and the current permission set as well as user-defined thread properties like named slots. 與直接以 CLR 為目標的程式不同，工作流程程式是在執行緒無從驗證的環境中執行的階層式範圍樹狀。Unlike programs directly targeting the CLR, workflow programs are hierarchically-scoped trees that execute in a thread-agnostic environment. 這意味標準的 TLS 機制無法直接用於決定哪些內容位於指定的工作項目範圍內。This implies that the standard TLS mechanisms cannot directly be used to determine what context is in scope for a given work item. 例如，兩個平行的執行分支也許會使用不同的識別項，而排程器也許會在相同的 CLR 執行緒上交錯執行。For example, two parallel branches of execution might use different identities yet the scheduler might interleave their execution on the same CLR thread. 執行屬性允許活動宣告哪些屬性在其子樹狀範圍中，以及提供設定和破壞 TLS 的攔截程序來與 CLR 物件適當地互通。Execution properties allow an activity to declare which properties are in scope for its sub-tree as well as provide hooks for setting up and tearing down TLS to properly interoperate with CLR objects.

span.span: Registers a new property.

span.span: The nearest property of the given name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用階層式範圍找到最接近的可見屬性。 finds the nearest visible property using hierarchical scoping. 如果有兩個屬性具有相同名稱，會傳回在父範圍中最接近的屬性。If two properties have the same name, the closest property at the parent scope is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當活動完成時，屬性會自動移除註冊。Properties are automatically unregistered when the activity completes. 這個方法可以用來在活動完成之前取消註冊屬性。This method can be used to unregister a property before the activity completes.
